statements: UPDATE inventory_alerts SET inventory_level = 10, last_updated = NOW() WHERE id = 1

UPDATE inventory_alerts SET notification_email = 'admin@example.com', last_updated = NOW(), inventory_level = 30 WHERE product_name = 'Product X';
UPDATE alerts SET description='New Description', threshold=10.5, alert_name='Updated Alert Name' WHERE alert_id=1;
UPDATE inventory_data SET price=25.99, stock_quantity=100, last_updated='2022-03-15' WHERE product_id=5;
UPDATE alerts SET threshold = 20.5, description = 'Updated threshold to 20.5' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_data SET last_updated = current_timestamp, price = 150.75, stock_quantity = 1000 WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_description = 'New description' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_data SET product_price = 25.99, product_quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_name='Critical Alert', alert_threshold=90 WHERE alert_id=1;
UPDATE notifications SET recipient_email='admin@example.com', notification_sent_at='2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE notification_id=2;

UPDATE inventory SET product_quantity = 20, alert_id = 2 WHERE product_id = 3;

UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 100, last_update = '2022-03-15 08:00:00' WHERE item_id = 5;
UPDATE alerts SET notification_method = 'Email', triggered_at = '2022-09-15 12:00:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1, last_update = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE item_id = 1002;
